the beautiful diamond shawl is ready to decorate your wardrobe!

the shawl is crocheted in the loveliest pattern and has three cute tassels sewn on. the shawl is crocheted in sultan deluxe and you can choose exactly whatever colour combination you are in the mood for :)

**skill level:** intermediate

enjoy!
